FAQ.q: What is Apla?
FAQ.a: Apla is an open source (public & private) blockchain platform based on a peer-to-peer network and built on the original blockchain protocol developed by Apla. Apla blockchain provides a secure, simple and compliant blockchain infrastructure for a fast-growing global collaborative economy segment.

FAQ.q: Does the Apla platform work on the Bitcoin, Ethereum, or some other blockchain?
FAQ.a: No, Apla is built on the basis of being its own original blockchain.

FAQ.q: What are the main differences between Apla and other public blockchain platforms with built-in mechanisms for the execution of smart contracts, such as Ethereum, Qtum, and those still being designed, including Tezos and EOS?
FAQ.a: Apla features unique functions that cannot be found in the aforementioned blockchain platforms, such as:<ul><li>Integrated application development environment implemented in a single client software;<li>Specialized template language for the design of interfaces, harmonized with the contract-building language;<li>Multi-level system for the management of access rights to data, contracts, and interfaces where rights can be granted to persons, member roles, and contracts;<li>Ecosystems – autonomous software environments for the creation of blockchain applications and user interactions with them;<li>Legal system – a set of regulations, codified in smart laws (specialized smart contracts), which regulate relations between the platform users, define the protocol parameters changing procedures, that are used to solve problems.

FAQ.q: What is an Apla dApp?
FAQ.a: An application built on the Apla platform is a system of tables, contracts, and interfaces with pre-configured permissions. Applications are built to perform a certain function or provide a service. An application does not require the presence of a unifying, coordinating contract (master contract); contracts are executed by user activities, and the results of their operation are recorded in tables.

FAQ.q: What is a node on the Apla platform?
FAQ.a: An Apla node is a computer on the Apla network that stores a complete version of the blockchain and a database that contains the current (most up-to-date) state of the platform. Nodes validate transactions received from the network, include them into blocks, and modify the current state of the database.

FAQ.q: What are Apla ecosystems?
FAQ.a: Ecosystems are virtually autonomous software environments for the creation of blockchain applications and user operations within them.

FAQ.q: Who can create an ecosystem?
FAQ.a: Any user of the platform can create a new ecosystem.

FAQ.q: How can a user become a member of an ecosystem?
FAQ.a: Registration in the platform network can take place in any existing ecosystem. There can be different procedures for membership admission, which are defined by the ecosystems’ policies: from posting information about a new ecosystem in a specialized catalog to sending out public keys.

FAQ.q: Can one user create more than one ecosystem?
FAQ.a: Yes, every user can create any number of ecosystems, and be a member of any number of ecosystems at the same time.

FAQ.q: Where is data stored in the Apla blockchain?
FAQ.a: Application data is stored in a common data storage environment: an unlimited set of tables of the platform's database. Tables with application data are not in any way bound to any particular smart contract and can be used by any and all applications of the ecosystem, based on the configured access rights.

FAQ.q: What is a smart contract on Apla?
FAQ.a: Smart contracts are the basic elements for the implementation of algorithms in applications on the Apla platform. Contracts are final portions of code that perform the following functions: (1) receipt of information from user interfaces or other contracts ('data' section); (2) analysis of data validity ('conditions' section); and (3) execution of required transactions – updating database records ('actions'). Apla contracts are written using a proprietary Turing-complete scripting language called Simvolio. The language includes the required set of functions to create data processing algorithms and conduct operations with database values. The contracts are created and modified using a special editor in the Molis software client. Operations involving data in the blockchain are performed by the current (most recent) versions of contracts. The complete history of changes made to contracts is saved in the blockchain and is available from the software client.

FAQ.q: Which software is used for creating applications and user interaction with them?
FAQ.a: Applications are written and executed in Molis – the single software client. No other software is required.

FAQ.q: Can platform contracts access data using third-party API interfaces?
FAQ.a: No, contracts can only directly access the data stored in the blockchain. Specialized oracles are used to work with external data sources.

FAQ.q: Can a contract saved in the blockchain be edited later?
FAQ.a: Yes, contracts are editable. Rights to edit contracts are established by their creators, who can deny any changes or grant rights to make changes to contracts, to specific persons, or configure a complex set of conditions in a specialized smart law. The Molis software client provides access to all contract versions.

FAQ.q: What is a smart law?
FAQ.a: A smart law is a contract that is created to control and restrict the operation of regular contracts, and thus the activities of the ecosystems’ members. A set of smart laws can be regarded as an ecosystem’s legal system.

FAQ.q: Can a contract call/execute another contract?
FAQ.a: Yes, contracts can execute other contracts by way of directly addressing another contract and providing parameters to it, or by way of calling a contract by link (name) (see contract language description).

FAQ.q: Can applications be localized to different languages?
FAQ.a: Yes, the software client has a built-in mechanism for localization support, allowing for the creation of interfaces in any language.

FAQ.q: Can interfaces be created without using the Protypo template language?
FAQ.a: Yes, the platform API can be used for that.

FAQ.q: Are interface pages stored in the blockchain?
FAQ.a: Yes, pages and contracts are stored in the blockchain, which protects them from falsification.

FAQ.q: What types of data banks can be used for the operation of contracts?
FAQ.a: The Molis software client includes instruments for the creation of database tables (PostgreSQL is used at the moment, but we may change that later), and the Simvolio contracts language has all the functions required for reading and writing of data. The Protypo template language includes the functions for reading data from tables.

FAQ.q: Is there any payment for the operation of applications?
FAQ.a: Yes, the use of resources of validating nodes should be paid for in platform tokens.

FAQ.q: Who pays for the operation of applications?
FAQ.a: An account (binding account), which the tokens for payment of resources are debited from, is set by the contract creator on its activation. It can be defined using an ecosystem’s smart laws, whether or not the ecosystem members will pay to work with the application and, if so, what method of payment is required (contributions or otherwise).

FAQ.q: How are applications within ecosystems protected from exploitation of any vulnerabilities?
FAQ.a: The platform team understands that there is no way to completely avoid mistakes in the program code of applications, especially given that applications can be written by any user. That’s why we decided to create a mechanism that eliminates the consequences of vulnerability exploitation. The platform has a legal system (a set of smart laws), that allows to suspend the operation of an application and make a number of transactions to restore the status quo where wrongful actions take place. The rights to execute such contracts and voting procedures to grant these rights are defined in the smart laws of the platform’s legal system.

FAQ.q: Is a master contract required for applications to work?
FAQ.a: No, it’s not. Contracts are autonomous program modules that execute some functions. Each contract is configured to receive specific data, properly check these data, and execute some action, which will be recorded as a transition in the database.

FAQ.q: How many nodes can an Apla blockchain network be comprised of?
FAQ.a: Full blockchain data can be stored across any number of nodes, but a minimum of three nodes are required for the consensus algorithm to operate as intended. Depending upon client requirements, we can create any number of nodes for private blockchains. The more nodes that make up the network, the more secure the blockchain.

FAQ.q: How can a new node join an existing network?
FAQ.a: Any network node with sufficient processing power and fault tolerance can become a validating node. A node becomes a validating node based on the voting of ecosystems, but only ecosystems that are endorsed by investors(platform tokens owners) as genuinely functioning can participate in such voting. Therefore, the platform network implements a new consensus algorithm – Delegated Proof of Authority (DPoA). With this algorithm, it is most likely that the validating nodes will be run by major ecosystems, since it is in their best interest to maintain the network operation.

FAQ.q: What happens when a transaction is sent to the Apla blockchain?
FAQ.a: The transaction is checked by a validating node and included in a block, which is then sent to the network. The block is received by every node. Nodes execute all transactions from the block in the sequence they were placed in the queue. Smart contracts are then executed with parameters passed to them in transactions, thus changing the state of the database simultaneously on all nodes of the Apla blockchain network.

FAQ.q: Can we delete data in Apla Blockchain?
FAQ.a: No, no data can be deleted from the Apla Blockchain. In the future, and in accordance with GDPR requirements, Apla will implement the option to remove data from the blockchain.

FAQ.q: What is a private key on Apla?
FAQ.a: A private key is a way to identify users on the Apla network. Every transaction is signed by a private key, which allows to precisely identify each transaction initiator.

FAQ.q: Why do users need passwords to work with the Apla platform?
FAQ.a: User passwords are required to prevent unauthorized persons from entering the network from your computer with your private key.

FAQ.q: Can users change their passwords?
FAQ.a: Yes, users can change their passwords at any time.

FAQ.q: Who can modify data on the Apla blockchain?
FAQ.a: Rights to add or edit data can be provided to specific users, user roles, or smart contracts.

FAQ.q: Can a hacker change data in the blockchain?
FAQ.a: To change the data, a hacker would need to take control of at least 51% of the validating nodes, which is highly improbable.

FAQ.q: Is there any block explorer for the Apla blockchain?
FAQ.a: Yes, the block explorer is available by opening the URL – application URL:8080. For example, if the URL of the application developed on the Apla blockchain is myshopping.com then we can find the block explorer at myshopping.com:8080

FAQ.q: Can we move data from a database of an existing traditional web application to an Apla application?
FAQ.a: Yes, we can transfer the data from existing databases to the Apla blockchain. This will be implemented by way of sending database records as transactions to the blockchain network. After that, Apla dApps will be able to use this data in accordance with the established access rights.

FAQ.q: Where are files sent to the blockchain stored?
FAQ.a: Files are stored in special tables as binary data.

SHOWREEL.TEXTo: Blockchain Platform for accelerating technological progress
SHOWREEL.TITLE: We are Apla
SHOWREEL.TEXT: Simple and Compliant Blockchain Solutions for Building Government & Business Ecosystems

2.TITLE: Private solutions
2.TEXT: In competitive markets with complex business processes, the winner is the one who is able to inspire trust through transparency amongst their partners.

INVENTION.TITLE: We use our own technology invention — Apla blockchain platform. It’s a secure, fast and agile solution

LIST.title: Decentralisation
LIST.p: All the resources — including data, smart-contracts and user interfaces - are stored on every node inside the network. Any change to data can only be made via smart contract execution. This makes it impossible for anyone in network to tamper with the data.

LIST.title: Security first
LIST.p: The Apla platform was initially design for governments, so security was essential and the first thing to consider. We are working hard to make the Apla blockchain platform completely secure. Only standardised cryptography and hashing algorithms are used, and there is a Bug Bounty program in partnership with HackerOne too.

LIST.title: Rapid application development
LIST.p: App development with Apla doesn’t require any specific knowledge about how P2P networks operate. It allows you to test new ideas and develop Proof of Concepts several times faster. Once dApp development is finished, the dApp can be used on desktop, mobile devices or via web interfaces.

LIST.title: Truly democratic governance
LIST.p: Network governance or critical decision making can be done in a truly democratic manner using the voting mechanism. Once enough users vote, a smart contract is executed automatically to perform the particular action voted for.

LIST.title: Single platform for everything
LIST.p: Everything that is needed for an app to function is already in place, including tools for smart contract development, the building of user interfaces and database table management. This means that you don’t need to write as much code to create your dApp. Moreover, this means that there are fewer potential vulnerabilities in you dApps.

LIST.title: Flexible access rights management
LIST.p:
Access rights can be configured for every action, including the execution of smart contracts, editing of any interface or working with data.
You can also allow data to be read from one single table or add new data tables for users who have specific roles, or configure smart contract execution only where specific conditions are met.

NEWS.title: Apla Blockchain Database Transaction Speed: 34,000 tx/s
NEWS.text: Following testing, Apla’s blockchain platform has managed to achieve a staggering database transaction speed of 34,000 tx/s. This is by no means the limit. Soon Apla will run much faster. For now, we would like to show you the benchmark database, which is integrating into the platform.

NEWS.title: Blockchain Ecosystem: What is it About?
NEWS.text: As the spark of blockchain revolution is engulfing the world, the technology is becoming more sophisticated as the day goes by. Blockchain engineers the world over are putting thought into turning their product into an engineering marvel and such ideas give rise to buzzwords of the day. Getting a hold on these buzzwords becomes imperative for C-level execs as well as investors so that the knowledge remains perceptible and nothing becomes arcane.

NEWS_SAV.title: Five stages of understanding blockchain
NEWS_SAV.text: Blockchain can be a tricky subject, but market players are slowly learning about how they can apply this new phenomenon to their business processes. Learning happens in stages; you can’t become a genius overnight. The same is with understanding blockchain. There are a myriad articles out there on the internet about blockchain, all with their own different stance and all based on the knowledge that each writer has when putting pen to paper (more like: fingers to keyboard). However, who really knows what in this wild west of blockchain propaganda?

VACANCY.TITLE: Product director
VACANCY.PREAMBLE:
At Apla we are waiting for a hero. A leader. The CaseFather.
We do realise that your first word wasn’t ‘inspiration’ but it would be great if your professional life looks as if it actually was.
VACANCY.DESCRIPTION:
This is a serious vacancy, so let’s just start straight away.

At Apla we are waiting for a hero. A leader. The CaseFather.

We do realise that your first word wasn’t ‘inspiration’ but it would be great if your professional life looks as if it actually was.

Apla is a company with 4 offices in different parts of the world. And its global performance fully relies on the climate in each residence. That is why we need someone who would grab the flag and initiate action. So that the others could follow, inspired, with the hearts full love and sincerity, into their grand battle of changing the world.

WE WOULD WANT TO UNSEE YOU IF YOU ARE

Egoistic
Enjoying the process, irrespective to the result
Ice-souled
Bureaucratic
Sexist
Racist

We know, some points are missing. We just don’t want to teach you bad words. We need you innocent.

WE SEE YOU

Ambitious
Agile
Willing to innovate
Flexible
Versatile
Independent
Team building
Humane

HOW WE WANT YOU TO SEE US

Imagine our future world. There is more than just innovation to it. This world is new. Built by our team. Built by you.

What about you?

There you are, with the prime ministers and others. Agreeing to speak at the best international conferences. Sending a selfie to your kids so that they smile proudly at their smartphone’s screen. Though there is nothing new – they have already seen you in the latest Forbes and TechCrunch.

Sounds good? We can do this for you. If you do the following for us:

HOW WE SEE YOUR WORK:
  • Managing the development and delivery of effective, stable and secure IT services aligned to the company and groups business requirements
  • Being responsible for all aspects of IT service delivery including business and manufacturing applications, networks, telecommunications, databases, Development, systems integration and staff management,
  • Collaborating with the corporate organization in the delivery of global services, projects and infrastructure.
  • Oversees IT Infrastructure / Service delivery for the company within the region
  • Recruiting, hiring, and managing a high performing IT Team.
  • Anticipating and handling multiple priorities and complex issues involving external and internal priorities
  • Applying the technologies, methods and techniques to develop, and deliver, effective and high quality business information systems;
  • Understanding and cooperating with other team members from different cultures;
THANKS FOR READING!

(No extra words. We hope you are a serious manager and would never want to waste your time)

P.S. Just wanted to say. JOIN US.

VACANCY.TITLE: Project manager
VACANCY.PREAMBLE:
Hello, our future Project Manager.
In Apla we launch a lot of projects that we love to nurture and pamper all the way through. When they grow up, they become cases. We badly need your skills to bring up all our ideas successfully. We trust in you.
VACANCY.DESCRIPTION:
Hello, our future Project Manager.

In Apla we launch a lot of projects that we love to nurture and pamper all the way through. When they grow up, they become cases. We badly need your skills to bring up all our ideas successfully. We trust in you.

WHAT WE DO NOT NEED YOU TO DO

To be responsible for delivering value through successful execution of projects within a dynamic working environment.

WHAT WE NEED YOU TO DO

Just be a nice project manager, okay? And please, do love that you do.

WHAT YOU NEED US TO DO

Here at Apla we promise you room for professional upgrade. Seriously. With a whole team made up with multinational specialists, great mentors and top level clients (quite challenging) you just have no chance not to mould yourself into a piece of project managing gold.

A BIT MORE BORING BUT NECESSARY SPECIFICS

If you know you can:

  • Ensure successful leadership of projects (planning, executing, monitoring, reporting on key project deliverables, providing timely status and metrics to measure project performance)
  • Facilitate meetings with cross functional teams engaging key stakeholders in business, IT, and Ops groups.
  • Communicate project status, managing budget, track issues and risks, and assemble documentation that is needed to ensure key stakeholders and inform executives of project status.
  • Ensure all project documentation is completed and meets audit requirements
we will embrace you as our brand new Project Manager immediately.

IF YOU ARE STILL READING THIS VACANCY DESCRIPTION

It would be great if you succeed the following:

  • Bachelor’s degree (IT or Business Related) preferred
  • Minimum 6 years of progressive experience as a Project Manager with a strong background in managing complex IT related projects PMI or other Project Management Certification desirable
  • Excellent organizational, written, and oral communication skills required, as well as strong attention to detail, motivation, and initiative.
  • Strong interpersonal skills and ability to successfully maintain relationships within a dynamic environment
  • Expertise with Powerpoint and Excel
THANKS FOR READING! THE WORLD IS WAITING TO BE SAVED BY YOU.

Oh, and we are waiting for you too.

VACANCY.TITLE: Sales director
VACANCY.PREAMBLE: At Apla we create projects based on super innovative technologies. Governments and big businesses make up our client list. We know they need us. But how do they know they need us? A question that we hope you can answer.
VACANCY.DESCRIPTION:
At Apla we create projects based on super innovative technologies. Governments and big businesses make up our client list. We know they need us. But how do they know they need us? A question that we hope you can answer.

We are looking for someone to communicate effectively with cross-functional and cultural groups and build strategic relationships with client teams to further penetrate existing clients and develop new business based on credible relationships with top executives.

In other words, we need to be sold all over the world. Effectively. Just like that rhyme.

You will not be alone, though. There is a team to help you with that. And it needs special guiding. As well as attention.

So, please brace yourself and check our needy requirements below:

  • You must have a proven track record of success selling high priced IT Products and conceptual services to C-Level Executives using consultative selling methods.
  • Sr Hunter with experience in 10M+ USD yearly targets
  • You must be resilient and excel in a fast paced, high energy, entrepreneurial environment.
  • You must also excel at finding and closing new opportunities in a highly competitive market and thrive as part of a fast growing, successful, expanding sales organization.
  • Experience with technology, software, hardware, services, equipment, major accounts, business solutions, consulting or subscriptions helpful but not required.

THANKS FOR READING!

COME AND SELL YOURSELF TO OUR COZY OFFICE.
WE ARE WAITING FOR YOU.

VACANCY.TITLE: Partnership manager
VACANCY.PREAMBLE: Apla is a big company with friends and partners all over the world. And we would love to keep it that way. How can we change the world if not all of us? Therefore, in our team your task will be a key one.
VACANCY.DESCRIPTION:
Apla is a big company with friends and partners all over the world. And we would love to keep it that way. How can we change the world if not all of us? Therefore, in our team your task will be a key one.

YOUR TASK

We would expect you to focus on optimizing our relationships with (other companies?) at the partner level. Which is why this position will require the ability to:

  • Work credibly and productively with our current partners towards achieving healthy, long-term partnerships
  • Work as an integral part of Apla management team to maximize the financial success of the partnership
  • Manage and motivate high powered IT partners
  • Advise the partners in a way that they find meaningful on their financial investment in Apla facility
  • Negotiate partnership agreements
  • Close new partnership deals
  • Communicate in a credible way with Apla Senior Management regarding concerns and needs, both on an individual and partnership level
  • Establish strong working relationships, ensure complete and timely communication and coordination of partnership strategy

OUR TASK

In Apla we will offer you a pool of highly qualified professionals great to build relations with. So, if you are really that good at what you do, just go and dive.

ADDITIONAL TASK

We see you as an exceptional person Someone who would become the voice of Apla to our partners. So, if you agree to do a bit of matching, please read the following characteristics:

  • Strong negotiator
  • Decision-maker
  • Creative
  • Team player
  • Trust gainer
  • Alliance-builder
  • Perfect speaker
  • Good listener
  • Passion, energy, integrity and drive deliverer

Please try matching all of these to you.
All ticks?
GET IN TOUCH WITH US.
WE ARE WAITING FOR YOU.
P.S. Thanks for reading. That was very partnerly of you.

VACANCY.TITLE: Marketing manager
VACANCY.PREAMBLE:
Here is a really responsible position.
Marketing is a tricky one to master and we need the freshest ideas. With you at our marketing helm, there will be nothing to worry about.
VACANCY.DESCRIPTION:
Here is a really responsible position. Marketing is a tricky one to master and we need the freshest ideas. With you at our marketing helm, there will be nothing to worry about.

FOR YOU TO DO

Apla is a strong, yet growing company using innovative technology quite specific and very breaking-through as well. Which is why market-wise we actually count on a nice place with a view.

To secure us on of those, we thought, you might as well occupy yourself in our team doing this:

  • Leading market research
  • Driving the product into the correct market channel
  • Leading the design and development of our client’s software based products.
  • Working cross-functionally with different departments within the organization.
  • Creating content to spearhead the communicative marketing for the product.
  • Taking significant go-to-market strategy responsibilities.
  • Being the VOC.
  • Travelling to do all listed above in other parts of the world

FOR YOU TO BE

We would love to see you as a part of our team. Especially, if you are:

  • Great analyser
  • Trend-follower
  • Strategy builder
  • Creative
  • Team player
  • Perfect speaker

FOR YOU NOT TO BE
  • Egoistic
  • Enjoying the process, irrespective to the result
  • Ice-souled
  • Bureaucratic
  • Sexist
  • Racist
FOR US TO DO

Hiring you to help us build strong marketing strategy and communication for Apla, we give you a share of the world we all wish to have – innovative, fast, easy, honest.
This will be your best professional case on the market.

THANKS FOR READING!
WE ARE WAITING FOR YOU.

VACANCY.TITLE: Designer
VACANCY.PREAMBLE: We could really just draw what we would love you to look like to get this position. The thing is, we need to see how you draw and how your work can help Apla conquet the highly developing world.
VACANCY.DESCRIPTION:
We could really just draw what we would love you to look like to get this position. The thing is, we need to see how you draw and how your work can help Apla conquet the highly developing world.

WHAT DESIGN MEANS FOR US

We are looking for someone who is perfectly skilled not only at visual implementation, but also visual thinking and visual strategy.

You are totally free to choose your religion, only remember about the god of modern IT products : the User. This is the one we expect you to know, feel and care about. Grab his or her senses and find the perfectly matching solutions.

WHAT DESIGNING FOR US MEANS FOR YOU
  • Working across media (web, print & ppt) and has a passion for graphic artistry
  • Being an advocate for top-tier design
  • Communicating complex concepts simply and accurately.
  • Developing the creative in multi-channel marketing campaigns -Supporting and collaborating with product marketing managers
  • Helping elevate Apla portfolio of products both internally and within the industry as a whole

If you are the one we are looking for, you might as well have a great passion for detail. There you go:

MUST-HAVE SKILLS
  • Excellent time management skills
  • Advanced-level knowledge of page layout and typography
  • Excellent presentation and verbal communication skills
  • The ability to sell your work to internal stakeholders, as well as to take criticism constructively
  • Ability to ask what might seem like dumb questions in front of others
  • Willingness and ability to write copy: copy is interface
  • Working understanding of print production techniques
  • Ability to work as part of a design team

MUST-HAVE EXPERIENCE

At least 3 years experience in graphic design, communication design, illustration or a related field.
Yes, that’s all. Anyway, we need to see the whole picture. If you know what we mean.

WHAT DESIGNING FOR US MEANS TO YOU

Isn’t it the sweetest feeling when your work meets the eye of millions of people all over the world? We bet it is. Prepare a separate shelf for pride in your soul.

THANKS FOR READING!
LOOKING FORWARD TO SEEING YOU AND WHAT YOU HAVE DRAWN WHILE READING ABOUT THIS POSITION.
P.S. Just kidding. Please, send us your portfolio, we meant.

VACANCY.TITLE: Sales manager
VACANCY.PREAMBLE: At Apla we create projects based on super innovative technologies. Governments and big businesses make up our client list. We know they need us. But how do they know they need us? A question that we hope you can answer as a part of our sales team.
VACANCY.DESCRIPTION:
At Apla we create projects based on super innovative technologies. Governments and big businesses make up our client list. We know they need us. But how do they know they need us? A question that we hope you can answer as a part of our sales team.

WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING FOR US

To help us be perfectly sold all over the world, you will do the following:

  • Hire, train and coach a team of sales personnel on their sales ability including managing to metrics.
  • Evaluate all sales personnel on their abilities
  • Manage performance that meets or fails to meet the set standards
  • Responsible for meeting designated team metrics provided by the partner and/or program management.
  • Manage your team to individual metrics via coaching, mentoring and counseling.
  • Maintain proper scheduling of resources and manage the team to maintain program service levels
  • Maintain integrity with teams accounts management, ownership and account profile.
  • Maintain open lines of communications with specified client contacts for the purpose of strengthening and enhancing Apla client relationship.

WHAT WE WILL BE DOING FOR YOU

As part of Apla you will enjoy a fast-paced career that offers exciting professional development and career growth opportunities.

So jump on board, join our journey, and take your career amazing places along the way!

THANKS FOR READING!
WE ARE WAITING FOR YOU!

VACANCY.TITLE: Data miner
VACANCY.PREAMBLE:
So here we are, mining a perfect data miner on this recruitment resource. Great.
Ironic as it might seem, we need you as a key specialist for our team. Apla is a company operating with the newest technologies, based on data. Which makes it the crucial ingredient in our world-changing recipe.
VACANCY.DESCRIPTION:
So here we are, mining a perfect data miner on this recruitment resource. Great.
Ironic as it might seem, we need you as a key specialist for our team. Apla is a company operating with the newest technologies, based on data. Which makes it the crucial ingredient in our world-changing recipe.

HOW TO MINE DATA IN APLA

As a part of our team, you will

  • Develop various custom reports using Cognos (examples include the Monthly Operational Review which bring Real Estate, Space, Financial and HR Data together)
  • Build operations, project management, lease & portfolio, space & occupancy, compliance and management, performance metrics and other premise related reports
  • Additional expertise will be required during global system migration from existing real estate system REMS to new system REALM
  • Follow report life cycle by developing and publishing reports in various Cognos environments (IST, UST, PROD, COB)
  • Perform process improvements to more effectively retrieve data from different sources to develop reports for analyzing real estate data in conjunction with other data coming in from feeds (i.e. HR, Finance, etc) to ensure data integrity
  • Perform tool and application evaluations (i.e. Cognos upgrades, discovery and development of dashboards, etc)
  • Participate in the Global Strategic Operations Data Management and Reporting Team Meetings
  • Develop ad-hoc reports to support senior level management, the CRS regions, and business customers requests.
  • Work with CRS business partners to assess reporting and then develop reports and work with the users to test and publish the reports. Data Mapping and documentation.

This has been lot of data on data mining. And here is a bit more:

HOW TO START MINING DATA IN APLA
  • 2+ Years - Data Mining, Data Analysis and Data Management experience including extensive report design and development
  • 2+ Years - Experience working with relational databases, such as Oracle, and SQL Server
  • 5+ Years - Experience and Knowledge of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
  • 5+ Years - Experience and highly proficient with Microsoft Office (excel, access, outlook, powerpoint)
  • 2+ Years - Experience with Cognos BI toolsets such as Report Studio, Query Studio, and Framework Manager.

THANKS FOR READING!
WE LOVE YOUR ORGANIZATION AND CONCENTRATION SKILLS.
WE ARE WAITING FOR YOU!

VACANCY.TITLE: Blockchain team lead
VACANCY.PREAMBLE: Blockchain is not just a word to us. This is the key to our ideas. Something that does the magic, leaving corruption and bureaucracy far behind in the gloomy past. We believe in blockchain technology and we are constantly working on its development.
VACANCY.DESCRIPTION:
Blockchain is not just a word to us. This is the key to our ideas. Something that does the magic, leaving corruption and bureaucracy far behind in the gloomy past. We believe in blockchain technology and we are constantly working on its development.
At this point we need a strong lead to manage those who help us with the development.
Yes, this is you.

PLEASE DO:
  • Manage the development team
  • Develop new prototypes, pilots, and production applications using the latest blockchain technologies
  • Work with a design and technology services firm that builds innovative products for large enterprises and early stage startups.
  • Work with the custom solutions range from blockchain solutions to Search and Analytics-based solutions.
  • Design and implement decentralized applications and protocols
  • Rapidly develop enterprise software applications and platforms using blockchain technologies
  • Provide technical leadership on blockchain technologies and work across peer groups to develop blockchain solutions for the business Qualifications
PLEASE DON’T:
  • Be egoistic
  • Enjoy the process, irrespective to the result
  • Be ice-souled
  • Be bureaucratic
  • Be sexist
  • Be racist

THANKS FOR READING!
WE ARE WAITING FOR YOU!

VACANCY.PREAMBLE:
Blockchain is not just a word to us. This is the key to our ideas. Something that does the magic, leaving corruption and bureaucracy far behind in the gloomy past. We believe in blockchain technology and we are constantly working on its development.

VACANCY.DESCRIPTION:
Blockchain is not just a word to us. This is the key to our ideas. Something that does the magic, leaving corruption and bureaucracy far behind in the gloomy past. We believe in blockchain technology and we are constantly working on its development.
And that is where you come in.

JUST ENUMERATING WHAT YOU USUALLY DO:

As a Blockchain Developer for Apla you will be

  • Developing new prototypes, pilots, and production applications using the latest blockchain technologies
  • Working with a design and technology services firm that builds innovative products for large enterprises and early stage startups.
  • Working with the custom solutions range from blockchain solutions to Search and Analytics-based solutions.
  • Designing and implement decentralized applications and protocols
  • Rapidly developing enterprise software applications and platforms using blockchain technologies
  • Providing technical leadership on blockchain technologies and work across peer groups to develop blockchain solutions for the business Qualifications

JUST PROMISING YOU THINGS

At Apla you will be contributing to one of the great processes of today’s world. With your help we will build a better future. Because it needs to be different. And we will do it. Together. With the help of our large multinational team.
THANKS FOR READING!
WE ARE WAITING FOR YOU.

WHAT DESIGNING FOR US MEANS FOR YOU
  • Working across media (web, print & ppt) and has a passion for graphic artistry
  • Being an advocate for top-tier design
  • Communicating complex concepts simply and accurately.
  • Developing the creative in multi-channel marketing campaigns -Supporting and collaborating with product marketing managers
  • Helping elevate Apla portfolio of products both internally and within the industry as a whole

If you are the one we are looking for, you might as well have a great passion for detail. There you go:

MUST-HAVE SKILLS
  • Excellent time management skills
  • Advanced-level knowledge of page layout and typography
  • Excellent presentation and verbal communication skills
  • The ability to sell your work to internal stakeholders, as well as to take criticism constructively
  • Ability to ask what might seem like dumb questions in front of others
  • Willingness and ability to write copy: copy is interface
  • Working understanding of print production techniques
  • Ability to work as part of a design team

MUST-HAVE EXPERIENCE

At least 3 years experience in graphic design, communication design, illustration or a related field.
Yes, that’s all. Anyway, we need to see the whole picture. If you know what we mean.

WHAT DESIGNING FOR US MEANS TO YOU

Isn’t it the sweetest feeling when your work meets the eye of millions of people all over the world? We bet it is. Prepare a separate shelf for pride in your soul.

THANKS FOR READING!
LOOKING FORWARD TO SEEING YOU AND WHAT YOU HAVE DRAWN WHILE READING ABOUT THIS POSITION.
P.S. Just kidding. Please, send us your portfolio, we meant.
